abstract: Panel appointed by New York State finds that minimum wage for workers in national fast-food chain restaurants should be raised, possibly as high as $15 per hour; says it is not yet ready to make full recommendation to State Labor Dept.
lead_paragraph: The three-man panel said it was not yet ready to make a complete recommendation.

headline.main: Fast-Food Restaurants Should Raise Minimum Wage, New York Panel Says
headline.print_headline: Panel Backs Raises at Fast-Food Chains

snippet: The three-man panel said it was not yet ready to make a complete recommendation.
